author: rwesten
msg: STANBOL-777: removed (most of) the transitive dependencies from the Entityhub pom.xml files. Adapted entityhub.indexing.core to use the new Constants to write the ReferencedStieMetadata; STANBOL-776: moved the Iterator utilities from the entityhub.core module to the entityhub.servicesapi module. This also required dependency upgrades for some modules to see the location of those utilities
